name: HaikuHarmony
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku harmony
des:
This skill reads ten different original haikus composed by a student in a User Experience design course focusing on vocal interfaces. It includes haikus on different subjects.

This skill allows users to hear 10 original haikus written by a student in a User Experience course focusing on vocal interfaces. It includes haikus on various topics.

Some example utterances are: "Alexa, tell Haiku Harmony to read me a haiku," "Alexa, ask Haiku Harmony to give me a haiku," and, "Alexa, tell Haiku Harmony to read a poem."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
